### Pull Request
**IMPORTANT: For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.**

#### Checklist
- [ ] Changes approved through issues
- [ ] Lint code (Run `yarn format`)
- [ ] Test code (Run `yarn test`)
- [ ] Updated documentation

- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] New Feature
- [ ] Breaking Change
